question: I am completely puzzled, I am a 41 year old female with diabetes, recently I have start having terrible pains in my stomach and in my upper back, the pain gets even worse at night where I can't sleep.  I can't imagine what;s happening to me.  If you have any suggestions please let me know. I have become desperate enough to go to the Doctors office, something i hate doing.  Please help.
title: stomach and back pain
